name: Hyper V-Ball - LDJAM 51
description:
Competitive Volleyball Action! Slam your friend's balls or just spend the evening with the AI. Alone on a Friday night? The training room is also there for you!

Versus AI Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move and jump. Use Spacebar or Enter to charge your hits.

Versus 2P P1 - WASD and Spacebar P2 - Arrows and Enter

Controller support, online multiplayer, and AI adjustments - Maybe eventually!
